description: The most lightweight construction offered in Polo Ralph Lauren sport coats, the Polo Artisan combines a utilitarian-inspired design with visible reinforced stitching and easy-open patch pockets. This version is crafted from washed cotton chino and finished with our signature embroidered Pony at the undercollar.
fitting_details: Polo Artisan: a shirt jacket construction with a natural shoulder and approx. 3.25" lapels.
Size 40R has a 29.75" front body length, a 29.25" back body length, an 18.5" shoulder, and an 18.25" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttoned throat latch. Signature embroidered Pony at the left undercollar. Three-button silhouette. Cuffs with three decorative buttons. Stitched patches at the forearms.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Interior right chest pocket. Interior left waist pocket.
Single vent. Lined at the back yoke.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size 40R.
